mapper.update:
UPDATE weixin_fans_count
count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
male = #{male,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
female = #{female,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
chinese = #{chinese,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
not_chinese = #{notChinese,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
cancel = #{cancel,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
lang_ch = #{langCh,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
lang_other = #{langOther,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
net_growth = #{netGrowth,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
next_openid = #{nextOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
nike_name = #{nikeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
new_fans = #{newFans,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
add_scene_search = #{addSceneSearch,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
add_scene_account_migration = #{addSceneAccountMigration,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
add_scene_profile_card = #{addSceneProfileCard,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
add_scene_qr_code = #{addSceneQrCode,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
add_sceneprofile_link = #{addSceneprofileLink,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
add_scene_profile_item = #{addSceneProfileItem,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
add_scene_paid = #{addScenePaid,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
add_scene_others = #{addSceneOthers,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
add_circle_friends = #{addCircleFriends,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.count count, a.male male, a.female female, a.chinese chinese, a.not_chinese not_chinese, a.cancel cancel, a.net_growth net_growth, a.new_fans new_fans, b.id user_id, b.nick_name nick_name from weixin_fans_count a LEFT JOIN weixin_userinfo b ON a.user_id = b.id where a.create_time=(select max(create_time) from weixin_fans_count) and b.nick_name is not null
select next_openid from weixin_fans_count WHERE nike_name=#{nikeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select next_openid from weixin_fans_count WHERE nike_name=#{nikeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select next_openid from weixin_fans_count WHERE user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and create_time=(SELECT max(create_time) FROM weixin_fans_count)

select
from weixin_fans_count WHERE
user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and create_time >= str_to_date(#{createDateBegin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d')
and create_time <= str_to_date(#{createDateEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d')

select
from weixin_fans_count WHERE user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and create_time = (select max(create_time) from weixin_fans_count where user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
